TopicTitle: Can anyone help me, i have made a star and there is a weird dotted line around my corona?

Articles.Content: I have made a custom star but there is a weird red dotted around the edge of it....  does anyone understand?

On 7/27/2018 at 8:49 PM, CHE Cometcrash said:

does anyone understand?

Erm..no.

Since this is a very specific issue, I would suggest to ask in the Kopernicus release thread instead. Read through the first post, especially the 'How to get support' part and I'm sure, you will get some help

 

In generall, it is always helpful to add basic informations about your KSP install (version, mod list, operating system), screenshots, log files, code snippets and so on. Basically, everything that helps to understand your problem and makes it easiert to help you.

In this case, you got an issue with a self created star, so at least you should add the config file you have created and a screenshot of the weird dotted line. This will allow other people to recreate your issue, try a possible solution on their own, maybe someone comes by who had the same issue or is used to do the same stuff and can tell you a solution just by looking at your config file. This will shorten the time it needs to help you and makes everything easier
